author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content: The transaction may consume 21000 gas, but the fees you pay when a miner includes the transaction is paid in wei (1 gwei = 1 billion wei), which is a unit of Ether. So it isn't "fee = 100gas", it'd be "fee = 100gwei". The transaction fee = (gas consumed) * (Ether per gas)
